text: læa phwk than cng khx nirthosʹ cak phracea khxng phwk than læw cng klabneuxklabtaw tx phraxngkh phraxngkh ca thrng hı paccay kæ phwk than sung paccay thi di pi cnthung wara hnung thi kahnd wi læa phraxngkh ca thrng prathan kæ thuk «phu thakhwam di sung khwam di khxng khea læa hak phwk than phinhlanghı thæcring chan klaw thæn phwk than sung kar lngthosʹ nı wan xan ying hıy
